concept.title: Configure cluster settings
concept.shortdesc: You can view and change cluster-wide settings and perform cluster-specific tasks from the Cluster tab of the Element UI.

conbody.p: You can configure settings such as cluster fullness threshold, support access, encryption at rest, virtual volumes, SnapMirror, and NTP broadcast client.
